description: Main frontend source file for a Flutter-based finance tracking application. It contains the root widget, authentication flow, main scaffold with bottom navigation, and several screens including dashboard, transactions, budgets, and charts, implementing core UI and navigation logic.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring the app theme and initial route.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Manages authentication flow, determining whether to show login/register or main app.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation bar and app bar, managing navigation between core sections.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and a shortcut to add new transactions; includes refresh functionality.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of all transactions with options to add, edit, or delete.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing a transaction, including date picker and validation.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Shows current budgets per category with refresh support.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Visualizes spending analytics such as category breakdowns with pie charts.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Provides user authentication UI with login functionality.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Allows new users to register accounts.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the respective screen or widget.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user and updates UI.
